sentence: Lobby bathrooms were closed for renovation
However they have the sidewalks ripped up right now for repairs
The first time they closed off the veranda for a painting project and took away the beach stairs for repairs
They are doing renovations to improve the hotel however we were never informed of this
The entire staff needs a complete overhaul on service
A bit noisy but nice they are remodeling and adding a spa
Furniture may need a little update
Room furniture could be freshened updated
The food service had not started yet but Kyle took our custom order let us not say high maintenance
The renovations that was going on did not affect our stay
The pool area and lazy river were nice but there are repairs due to the age are needed
The rooms may need a little updating like new carpet and paint but they are super clean and the beds are very comfy
Well the front desk attendant said it was wrong and needed to be updated
Lastly I will stay there again and because it is a popular spot there is some renovations that is needed
When we arrived we were told about the beach reconstruction
One thing that has not changed the half off happy hour everyday and fabulous room service breakfastIt is also time to update the suites
The only negative to this property is it needs a facelift great location and staff
They were remodeling and had moved the lounge to the lobby
The rooms are comfortable but could use a little maintenance
The hotel has great potential but needs to have some money spent on updating and maintenance in order to reach it is full potential
If they can update all of the rooms this will be a great hotel
But the hotel is under a big renovation

Very comfortable quiet a little renovation going on but not a big deal I like that they are trying to constantly make a place even beterHad an “ old Floridian ” feel with rockers on porch overlooking ocean multiple fire pits for couples or family lit at dark every night
I hope to return to the facility following the renovations to see the room upgrades
The updates are basic except for the bathrooms
However when we arrived we were told the pool area and fitness facility along with a few rooms were being renovated and unavailable
They just finished obvious renovation at least on our room
Valet damaged the roof of my SUV and denied they caused it which cost me quite a bit of money to repair on my own

when we arrived back at the hotel at 4 pm after no contact from them all day we were told they had no rooms and were full up I got straight onto my booking agent back in the UK through Live Chat and they confirmed I had paid and booked a room it was only after many backwards and forwards that the hotel gave in and confirmed my room a terrible start funny thing is this happened to 2 of our friends as well must be some sort of con going on The hotel is rundown and old and needs total refurb staff were nice and friendly and it is right on the beach but do nt bother better places to stay
The remodeled rooms look nice but many small details are missed pencil writing on marble floors missed paint around towel holders not quality work
The hotel was recently renovated and the room now include wood floors instead of carpet
The only negatives were that the day we were there we were told upon arrival that the pool would be closed from 8 12 for some repairs
They ’ve obviously been revamped I ’m assuming the rest of the hotel is to follow as parts of it are very tired
Make sure to get an updated room its worth it
